title: Anthony Huber’s Parents Sue Kenosha Authorities Over Son’s Killing in Unrest
sub_head: Kyle Rittenhouse was charged last year with the fatal shooting of Huber and another man
body:
City authorities in Kenosha, Wis., are being sued by the parents of a man allegedly shot and killed by Kyle Rittenhouse last year.
The family of Anthony Huber allege that the police and sheriff’s departments emboldened those protesting on the side of law enforcement, including Mr. Rittenhouse, against protesters on the opposing side.
Kenosha, about 30 miles south of Milwaukee, became a flashpoint last summer after Jacob Blake, a Black man, was shot repeatedly by a white Kenosha police officer in late August.
“The police are supposed to serve and protect but that’s not what the Kenosha police did,” Anthony’s father, John Huber, said in a statement. “If they had done their job, my son would still be alive today.”
An attorney representing Kenosha County and County Sheriff David Beth said they weren’t responsible for Mr. Huber’s death.
